              double y1,

              double x2,
              double y2,
              double z2,
              double x3,
              double y3,
              double z3)
        Constructor for initializing the face.
        Parameters:
        x1 - x component of the first point
        y1 - y component of the first point
        z1 - z component of the first point
        x2 - x component of the second point
        y2 - y component of the second point
        z2 - z component of the second point
        x3 - x component of the third point
        y3 - y component of the third point
        z3 - z component of the third point

      • Face3D

        public Face3D(Point3D p1,
              Point3D p2,
              Point3D p3)
        Initialize the face from points. the values of the point are copied to the internal array. so changing original points will not affect the face.
        Parameters:
        p1 - first base point
        p2 - second base point
        p3 - third base point

      • point

        public Point3D point(int index)
        Returns the point on the face, index 0-2 should be used
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Point3D object

      • center

        public Point3D center()
        Calculates the middle point of the face.
        Returns:
        Point3D object of the center.

      • intersection

        public static boolean intersection(Face3D face,
                                   Line3D line,
                                   Point3D point)
        Calculates if the line intersects with a face. if intersection of the line is found with the plane that represents the face, the point is checked for the bounds of the triangle that makes up the Face3D object.
        Parameters:
        face - face object with three points
        line - line object with two points
        point - contains the intersection point of the plane with line
        Returns:
        true - if line intersects with plane and is within the bounds of the face, false - otherwise.

        public java.lang.String toString()
